nodes.text: Angela was a Human female who lived on the planet of Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
By the time of the Battle of Yavin, Angela lived in Coronet City with her husband Ilyamo.

Circa 1 ABY, Ilyamo and Angela went to Doaba Guerfel because Ilyamo wanted to go hiking. Ilyamo joined a group who went hiking in the Thaos Mountains with the ranger Myron Beech. However, the group suddenly disappeared. Desperate, she begged a spacer, sent by Commander Talte of the Corellian Security Force, to find him. The spacer finally discovered that the hikers were captured by psychotic cave-dwellers, an anti-government and criminal group. The CorSec eventually assaulted the cave where the hostages were kept and freed the hostages, including Ilyamo.
Some time later, Angela highly recommended the spacer who rescued her husband to her friend Madison Silene after her husband Kyran also disappeared.

Angela was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Angela was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
